title: Climate finance: A costly dodge - Frontline
content: Climate finance: A costly dodge  Frontline
description: The burden of climate finance must be shared fairly. But, in the context of the work being done by the IPCC, developed countries talk of measures such as “debt-for-climate swaps”, suggesting that the flow of new grant money is not the priority, even as developing countries link their climate plans and targets to certain levels of cross-border financial flows they must receive.
